publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 85
ab.l: Č́eb́ar avaz ḱot́uŕuv́č́uǵa u- lanlarynyn Qoraḥnyn miźmor. Śuv́ǵuń e H jerijni qajttyrɣyn qajtu- vun Jaʿaqovnun.
Bošatḥyn jazyɣyn ulusujnun japyrɣyn bar jazyḥlaryn hamḿeš́a.
Yštyrɣyn bar ačuvujnu qajttyrɣyn qabunmaḥtan ačuvujnu.
Qajttyrɣyn biźni jarlyɣašly Teńrimiź da buzɣun ačyrɣan- maɣyjny birǵamiźd́ań.
Dunjaɣa dejińmo ačuvlanyrsyn biźd́a uzartalyr- musun ačuvujnu dordan dorɣa dejiń.
Muna śeń qajtḥyn tiri tut- ḥun biźni da ulusuj bijańsińĺar śeniń byla.
Ḱorǵuźǵuń e H ševaɣa- tyjny da jarlyɣašyjny biźǵa b́ergiń.
Ešitajim ńe śoźĺar ol Teńri H ki śoźĺar bazlyḥny ulusuna da ḥasid́ĺarińa da qajtmaslar artyḥ t́elilikḱa.
T́ek juvuḥtur qorḥuvčularyna jarlyɣašy toḥtatma hašɣaḥasyn jerimiźd́a.
Ševaɣat da kertilik juluɣušurlar rastlyḥ da bazlyḥ keliš́adirĺar.
Kertilik jerd́ań bit́ar da rastlyḥ ḱokĺard́ań baɣar.
Daɣy H b́erir ol jaḥšyny da jerimiź b́erir bitišiń.
Rastlyḥny alnynda üŕut́ur da qojar jolɣa atlamlaryn.
